original_text: I do not want you to be unaware, brothers and sisters, that I planned many times to come to you (but have been prevented from doing so until now) in order that I might have a harvest among you, just as I have had among the other Gentiles.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 여러 번 너희에게 가고자 한 것을 너희가 모르기를 원하지 아니하노니 이는 너희 중에서도 다른 이방인 중에서와 같이 열매를 맺게 하려 함이로되 지금까지 길이 막혔도다

sentences.original_text: I do not want you to be unaware
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희가 알지 못하기를 원하지 않노니

sentences.original_text: that I planned many times to come to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 여러 번 너희에게 가고자 하였으나

sentences.original_text: but have been prevented from doing so until now
in order that I might have a harvest among you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에서 어떤 열매를 맺게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: just as I have had among the other Gentiles
